verses.name: Jeremiah 50:9
verses.text: For, lo, I will raise and cause to come up against Babylon an assembly of great nations from the north country: and they shall set themselves in array against her; from thence she shall be taken: their arrows shall be as of a mighty expert man; none shall return in vain.

verses.name: Jeremiah 50:10
verses.text: And Chaldea shall be a spoil: all that spoil her shall be satisfied, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 50:11
verses.text: Because ye were glad, because ye rejoiced, O ye destroyers of mine heritage, because ye are grown fat as the heifer at grass, and bellow as bulls;
